div.p: A single value set for all security labels defined by FHIR.
This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

ul.li: Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ConfidentialityClassification
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-InformationSensitivityPolicy
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-Compartment
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-SecurityIntegrityObservationValue
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-SecurityControlObservationValue
Import all the codes that are contained in http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/v3-ActUSPrivacyLaw

description.value: A single value set for all security labels defined by FHIR.
